entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as someone who can hear Harry's voice over the raging wind.

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: Katie Bell is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is described as being cursed and writhing on the ground.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as one of the people trying to quieten Katie Bell.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is described as trying to quieten Katie Bell and later comforting Leanne.

entities.name: leanne
entities.description: Leanne is a person who is friends with Katie Bell. She is described as sobbing and trying to comfort Katie.

relationships.description: Hagrid carries Katie Bell towards the castle after she is cursed.
Hermione comforts Leanne, who is sobbing and trying to comfort Katie Bell.
